creditline: Gift of Mrs. F. Peavey Heffelfinger, Mrs. James O. Moore, Jr., and Mrs. Walter P. Bradley
description: Pitcher, silver lustre, decorated in white resist with lion (56)
markings: \'Ann Morley 1814\', \'when this you see remember me/ and keep me in your mind/ let all the world say what they will/ speak of me as you find\'
title: Pitcher
